question:
The Government of India has created a Project Development Fund (PDF) to facilitate Indian investment and broaden manufacturing base of Indian companies in which of the following countries?
  1. Cambodia
  2. Laos
  3. Thailand
  4. Myanmar
  5. Vietnam
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: The Government of India has created a Project Development Fund (PDF) to facilitate Indian investment and broaden manufacturing base of Indian companies in Cambodia, Laos, Myanmar and Vietnam (CLMV) countries. The Fund has been created under the Department of Commerce, Ministry of Commerce and Industry, and is being managed by Exim Bank, as the Empowered Institution under the initiative. Exim Bank will identify opportunities for investment by Indian companies in the CLMV region, so as to help companies integrate into the Regional Value Chain.
